storyInfo: A hero born of darkness and intrigue, an incarnation of an evil god haunting the history of Ursus, a fated rebellion, the beginning of the undulations of history.

attributes.content: It was what left the deepest impression on her current self.
It was the day her 'noble life' came to an end.
You're back.
attributes.name: Phidian Noble

attributes.content: I thought you weren't fond of that sword. Why carry it on your person?
attributes.name: Phidian Noble

attributes.content: Just may as well.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Phidian Noble

attributes.content: The smell of mud is stuck to your clothes. No smell of blood, though, nor anything singed. Your maidservant mentioned you were in a rush to meet me, so much so you did not bathe, nor change. Let me hazard a guess. You haven't done anything.
attributes.name: Phidian Noble

attributes.content: Did you find a better way, Talulah? Of dealing with this thorn in our side? You found a better way, and thus did not do as I told you to, is that it?
attributes.name: Phidian Noble

attributes.content: You didn't just want me to eliminate Major Antonio. You tried to trick me into killing a child.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Kashchey... a child. Antonio was taking his son on a trip, and you had me frame him so the Gendarmerie would beat him to death on his way to the next city over. His son would've had no chance of escaping.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Antonio makes an art of covering himself. You should easily have been able to tell that that young boy was not his son.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I've taught you this. In times when we have greater goals, we cannot avoid making sacrifices in our morality and resources.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Given you've let Antonio go, the next time he surfaces may well be in the residence of some Victorian secret service official.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Those horrid Felines would then surely make a fine point of our four neighboring cities' shipping routes for the whole year...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: ...and take it as a pretense to identify our trading partners, investigate our resources, draw an outline of our import and export itineraries, and produce a clear grasp of our defense arrangements.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I've already destroyed the files.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Wonderful! Very well done. You are quite capable, aren't you?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: But, Talulah, how do you intend to certify... to at all assert, that Antonio 'had never' seen in those records before?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: If he did not know their contents, why take them with him?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: And how would you prove that he'd betray your dukedom? Betray Ursus? Why didn't you go to question him, or seize him? Why go straight to eliminating him?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I do not need to give proof. Questioning him would grant him the opportunity to dispute his charges and escape punishment. His conduct cannot be pardoned.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: If he may have possibly done so. Then. As far as I'm concerned, as Ursus is concerned, as the laws and decrees are concerned, that is sufficient.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: He cannot. He is not allowed to have 'possibly done so.'
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: —Antonio has already been dealt with. After you destroyed the files, my Scales cleaned up the remainder for you.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I knew it. I just knew... you wouldn't let him go.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I've only been training you ceaselessly so that you may step by step become ever better. Now, you see that you have once again failed my expectations. You did not work as well as you did last time, Talulah.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Your performance at the Shuvata Conference was outstanding, Talulah, and you ought to admit, too, that you revel in how it feels.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: How it feels to stand on a peerless summit.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Don't ridicule me. Everything about you only stokes the anger in me to a roar.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Then you must surely revel even more in the feeling of perfection.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I'm very clear on your misgivings, and I understand how you think, too. That is why...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: The Scales let that boy acting as his son run free.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: How about that, Talulah? That wasn't something out of reach of your lone capability, is it?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: The boy in question was his son. Was. His. Son.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It makes no difference if he wasn't.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: When that boy comes of age, he'll find you, and he'll take revenge for his father.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Then perhaps you should prepare... prepare for some far-flung moment to take revenge for your own father?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Talulah, the one who killed him is still alive and well, after all.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I've given you this answer before. You must be sufficiently trained to the point you are capable of personally avenging him. Mm. And you currently... are not yet so.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: ...You can shut up, now, Kashchey!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ah, excepting that, Talulah, excepting your own personal wants, I do have ever higher hopes that you may become an outstanding individual.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: An executioner, a lead gendarmerie, a noble officer, a conspirator, a killing machine of a caster?! When you say 'an outstanding individual,' is that what you mean?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah, Talulah. No.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I long for an heir.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I never imagined you'd say something so sickening outright.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But, well, *chuckle* I'm sorry, Duke.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Your hopes are all...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Fruitless.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I can see you've gotten fired up. Tell me, then, Talulah, tell me something. What is it you've done that has you so pleased with yourself?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Half a year ago, I got a hold of a small splinter of Originium ore, and can you guess what I did with it...?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I embedded it in my own arm.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: With wonderful results.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I am Infected already.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm an Infected now, Duke Kashchey. My life is wound short, and your schemes, your plans, your investments, all for naught. You have no way to use me ever again.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Everything I am was by your own design, wasn't it? And now, no longer.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ah. Truly... an unforeseen method.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Does it taste good? The flavor of your conspiracy bled dry?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Kashchey, I've already become what Ursus and the world at large most reviles. We most despicable Infected... across the cities, the tundras, the barrens, we most depraved, lowly Infected.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And if your sister saw you like this, would she be happy?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Don't you—!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What is it that made you scheme, rebel against me so, my daughter?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: —You.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You deceived me. Lied to me, you said Wei Yenwu masterminded the murder of my father. You never told me they confronted you together, drove you out of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You never told me what role you played in my father's death. Even if Wei Yenwu killed him, even if he is guilty, even if he deserves to die for it—
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You can't escape blame either.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: On the surface, you treat your subjects well, help with settling the villages around the city, give the Infected stable residence...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But in actuality, you have the Infected and your residents living entirely different lives—you let the inhabitants feed their own egos on the Infected.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You've taken this city plundering its own residents and embellished it into a duty! To the point that they push around the Infected and the nomadic non-dwellers to bring themselves comfort!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Is this your dukedom, then? Is this your city and your rule?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You use inequality to mold a facade, and a facade to expand your influence?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I cannot endure this any longer. Even if I didn't fault your hypocritical means and twisted tricks, your pathological lies and false benevolence already had me at wit's end!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I've taught you this before, Talulah.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I've taught you—'In this period of excessive calm, they cannot accept mutual, equal treatment.'
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Not unless we draw this period of mediocrity to an end.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You and I may accept their autonomy, just as the Columbians and Siracusans have. But what of themselves?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: They will elect their next consul, and their next lord. Because they do not esteem others. They only fear authority and violence.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Not only that. They don't allow for anyone braver than themselves, smarter than themselves. Kinder. More merciful... Not unless you are their duke, or their emperor.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You sympathize with them. You sympathize with my subjects, sympathize with such residents whose backs are forced against the wall by tax collectors and bureaucrats.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: That is wonderful.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Moreover, even you continue to force yourself to spit vile slurs that humiliate the Infected so... I do vaguely recall.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You constantly made revisions to my policies, in ever greater attempts to protect them, so much that you didn't even fear arousing the citizens' wrath.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I have spent a great deal of time ironing their moods out, Talulah.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I'm not sympathizing with them!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You certainly do love them.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Why you...?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm very gratified, Talulah, that you should truly care for them. You've come to resemble me more and more, my daughter.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: ...Who the hell gave you the right to keep saying this crap?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But your superficial actions will not, and cannot succeed.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: And what makes you think you know what I'm going to do? You don't have the power...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No matter should all people in sum desire to reach one single good outcome——those people, as ever, still may fail.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Talulah, Talulah. It is because that golden outcome of theirs, and your daydreams, are fundamentally distinct.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You have no ability to make differing people endorse some identical action. Their disputes will clash and devolve, and that cannot be avoided.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: How can a Sarkaz face a Sankta? How can a soul from Kazimierz face a soul from Ursus? How can a sturdy yet toilsome bear face an arrogant yet impotent hippogryph?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You think to let them know how to act? What an arrogant notion, my daughter! You wish to take this appearance and this rank of yours, and appeal to them to do something?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Ah, of course, this I know. You certainly could do so.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Talulah, in time, you will rule those destined to follow you. You have inherited the Black Snake's knowledge, the Red Dragon's blood flows through you, you walk the Bear's land, and you thumb through the Hippogryph's history.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: No person should be born to be ruled by another.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But they crave your rule. For all their lives, they've been awaiting someone like you to rule over them. Ursus may well tremble for you, my daughter.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Those who rule others will inevitably be ruled themselves by the stronger, Kashchey.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ah, now that is a concept close to me, Talulah. Let me give you your final lesson, then.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Talulah, we will come to transcend this sort of transient, worldly rule.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: The last Emperor is dead, yet his shadow is still cast upon these great lands of ours. His will, his force of mind, have already passed beyond that era.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: He inherited the true Empire of Ursus, sustains Ursus's flourishing lands, lets the people of Ursus live.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Should we lose the sun, the luxuriant branches and stems that Ursus grows will at once wither away, and all that will remain across this world is inferior creatures, ever more putrid, sucking the nutrients from each other.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: These people you have seen—
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: They take pleasure in savagery, widespread slaughter, masochism, and are at once fearful and selfish...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You dream of education and ideology to draw them in, enlighten them. But you don't know that they bear not the slightest interest in what you have to say... Talulah, you deserve to know this.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: They have survived across this world of ours for countless years, and have become accustomed to a certain deep-rooted way of life. You are merely but a stranger, crashing in on it.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: So-called rulers, so-called nobles, so-called armies... merely the people of strength, the people lapped in luxury, the people who withstood training.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Domains can shift, armies can rebuild, rules can fall to ruin...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: No rule can endure, except where the voluntary will of Ursus's people follows. They will never be ruled. They only press forth, forever.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: —The small charity you make is exchanged for obedience. For unrealistic expectations.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: And how the hell would you know what they're meant to be?  It was Ursus that ravaged them to this point!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I am very clear about it. Ah, I am all too clear about it.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: And this is why you think they will go with you? For their bread, their potatoes, their clean water and bonfires? Is this how you would promise them?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: They will. And then, once they starve, their first thought will be to make a meal of your corpse.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: If you carry such unrealistic fantasies of them, you will hate them. You will surely hate them.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Kashchey, I am not you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I am nothing whatsoever like you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Yet you are already the same as me. You simply have not been roused from your daydreams yet.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: In truth, you can and may leverage all you have at hand.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: If you have some goal, then go. Use terror to destroy terror. Use life to rule life. Use sacrifice to guide sacrifice. Use ignorance to breed ignorance. Use suffering to manufacture suffering.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You have learned all of these methods. They are already your arms. All that's left is to learn to make use of them... to get used to them.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Until your beloved people understand, in the truest sense of the word, their country, and the significance of their existence.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I can't even tell what you're spouting all this hell-ridden doctrine for, if anything.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: All this is fact. All this, you will confront.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: How about this, my daughter. You don't trust me.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: So I wish to make a wager with you.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: In these many years, the Originium Arts I have cultivated in you have long since budded. Their time to fruit is already now.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: ...What... did...?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: In your life to come, you need only raise doubt of all you persist in, you need only raise the slightest hatred of the ones you proclaim your compatriots, and those who you think ought to be free...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: And you will immediately settle this wager between us. It is whether, in that moment, you will walk the path I taught you.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Perhaps, in these coming years, you will be fortunate enough to avoid those conditions yet. You may, with sheer luck, be living within a fairytale land.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Perhaps the people before you will chance to have secret sorrows. They can be understood, explained—oh, they were forced into helplessness...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I can wait. This country can wait. Be it three years, five years, a decade, a century, you will only arrive at the same answer. Though you will not live an Infected's life for long, I know that day will come.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: The Empire of Ursus finds itself in a period of repeated ailment. Crops will not grow on the soil of the barrens. Soil in shadow can only bear forth flowers of corruption.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You may be betrayed by those you adored. You may witness the moments in which your friends die for you. You may realize the expectations you held for the future have lost all meaning.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Because all that you do, in other people's eyes, still cannot make up for the pressure you bring about with your appearance, your status.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You will realize it all can be sacrificed. You will realize that they all love themselves more than their neighbors. You will come to know that your proud struggle symbolizes nothing at all.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You will come to see. These great lands you threw yourself to do not want you.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You will see your thoughts, your actions, become nonexistence. You will see them spurn all you revered, your life, your dignity and philosophy void of all significance.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Because these people, who you suppose to call noble, are but ambling corpses.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: All I have encountered, you will encounter too.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You want... You want me to... surrender...!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No, no. I truly am using these Originium Arts. This is no deception, nor a threat.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Oh, that said, my Arts are utterly feeble. All I have taught you constitutes the foundations of these Arts.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: These Arts, in the moment you reject me, will carry no impact whatsoever.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: But should you recognize me, should you have understood me, should you realize just the sort of world you're standing in...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: —Tick, tock. Tick, tock. Chime. Chime. Chime.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You will become me.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Ursus's future will from then on be in your hands.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: ...What are you talking about?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: What do you... what do you mean by all this?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Conscious manipulation? Thought suggestion? Have you gone insane? It was you who taught me to withstand these Arts! It was you who taught me how to break free from the psyche's Originium Arts!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Stop.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Why would I use such contemptible, destructive Arts on my own heir?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: My Arts only expedited a course of events. Expedited your recognition of this great world of ours, your questioning yourself, doubting yourself, loathing yourself and seeing clearly, anew, your own course.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Sans these Arts, all this still would have happened. They were just to get you there a little faster.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Everyone in the city, living a make-believe normal life, has learned to hypnotize themselves.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: They are skilled in escaping from the facts, taming themselves with rules and morals. Using the lowly shell of the loser to hide just how easily harmed they are by cruel reality...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: But I have supplied you a set of armor, a sort of arms, and an ego.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: These can save you your self-doubt and self-harm, in the course of it all. Save you your distress, your struggle. Conserve your time. You will stand up ever faster than you were kicked down by reality, and you will be reborn.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You needn't spend too much of your life denying your own self.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: All I have taught you will once again bear anew within your mind, and you will, as if spinning silk from the cocoon, weave anew the knowledge.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You will rid yourself of your superstitions, and in your well-rounded garden of wisdom, find a path winding yet with certain end.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Talulah, Ursus's destiny breathes as one with you.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: The Black Snake shall walk with you. This immortal will shall never die.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: —You—
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Are you cursing me?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Are you trying... to use yourself... to mold me?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No, Talulah, this is not a curse. This is a blessing.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I bless you, my daughter.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: The moment you wake from your unrealistic fancy of human nature, you will be conscious. Of why we struggle so for this land's most beautiful future.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: (Yan language) Just shut it! You're... full of such utter shit!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I never taught you such inflammatory Yan vernacular. But it may serve you to learn some. That's the role you'll be playing soon, after all.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Hah. Obviously. You didn't let me talk like this in public, so I'd maintain my so-called image—
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: —It was to cover you.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I calculate so as to make you think of others, but you denounce my proposals, profane my language. You've remembered all I've taught you, and now want to flee, Talulah...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: But I'm not worried. Because, in the end, you will come back to this path.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: The space between people is filled with hatred, and by that hatred, they are ruled. Love births hate. Indecision births hate. Admiration births hate.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Hatred is the inevitable outcome of interaction. It takes as little as two people to facilitate a sort of rule. Unless they are like me, and love all people equally.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Will you hate me, Talulah? For what I have done, this world will do to you. That is all.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: What you do has nothing to do with me... nothing at all.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'll have no part of it! None!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ah... good. Truly splendid.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: To not inherit the name, to not harness the authority, to not exploit the position. Wonderful, my child. You have great resolve.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Go and establish your cause by your own hand. If you don't wish to inherit my domain and political resources, my wealth and my power, then by all means.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You may seize them yourself. That you could do so would still fulfill my greatest dreams.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: No one told you you could define my aspirations!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No, no, of course I wouldn't dream of doing so. But know well, no Kashchey would be willing to accept such a 'present.'  To our diligent, prideful selves, it would be an insult!
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I have already taught you everything I can.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: As for all your goals from here on, they will be your own.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: My daughter... you truly are outstanding.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: You break off from all you've known without a second thought, in exchange for a new, novel path...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: The Infected will open up a very different sort of territory for you. Your actions upon this land we call Ursus will be unprecedented.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: (She unsheathes her sword.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I only came face-to-face with you today for one thing. I didn't think I'd be forced to sit through your wicked, venomous sermon.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ah. Have I been waiting for this day?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I often wondered if Wei Yenwu missed the chance to kill me and instead would send one of his hands to do it?  So it was you, it was—always going to be you.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: To be an executioner for the one who murdered your father, and in place of him who you bear hatred, to kill who he hates. Oh, what a beautiful outcome.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Your slaughter testifies to my point of view. I shall gladly give up resistance, and die by your hand, my daughter. This action will form your bridge towards truth, and allow my death to forge your foundations.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I'm not your daughter... I'm not.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'm killing you to put a stop to your evil, once and for all.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And then, Talulah, you. You will do evil.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I've heard enough.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And then you will do good. And you will recognize all the good I did.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Ah. This sword. I never had the housekeeper confiscate it... I'm not fond of this sword. You use Arts much more than you use swords... but you were still allowed to carry it.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: It will remind you where you came from...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: (A great roar.)
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...and it will witness our path, yours and mine.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Do you hate me, Talulah?
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I won't be taken in, you rotting, putrid snake! You're a villain beyond all else! Your life ends here!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: *hiss*, *cough*, *hiss*, *hiss*...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Only the lobe... of my lung... *hiss*...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Your strike... was not... accurate.
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I won't hate you, Kashchey.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I may hate your endless, long-winded, rancid sophistry, but you yourself haven't earned my hate.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I pity you. Your death only testifies to your loneliness, your vain attempt to turn yourself into a mirage.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I'll let you know the sheer absurdity of all you espoused. Not that you'd be able to know, now.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Hah, hah... wonder... ful...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: With my death, Wei may feel... a weight off him, too...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: I look forward... to when... you bare... your regret... your... hate...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: ...Remember this...
attributes.name: Kashchey

attributes.content: Talulah, remember this.
Your end is in me.
Talulah, very carefully, pulls out the sword from the Duke's chest.
Her mind is somewhere far, far away. She leaves the towering castle, leaves the city, outruns her pursuers...
The seeds, already planted, waiting only to sprout.
And so you came all the way to where we were.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: All of that was years ago, now.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...After Kashchey died, did anything happen in the city? Did you run into any trouble?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: If anything else happened, I probably wouldn't have ever reached your village.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: The city... After I left, I heard Kashchey's domain and wealth were quickly carved up amongst the Fourth Army.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: And as far as I go, nobody cares. Who'd care about some... *chuckle* city girl? Not when she made herself scarce.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I did wander too far, though. I only came to my senses once I was already at the old couple's place.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Trust me, back then, my brain was the picture of a mess. I can barely even remember what I encountered along the way.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Ma'am said that the day you came, you were bloody, tip to tail. It was half a miracle she could still wash those clothes clean.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Did you ever wonder, if maybe our village would secretly kill you?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Wait, where's this coming from?!
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Well... I'm just guessing, you must've thought of it.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: You wouldn't do that. Your harvests were good, you'd just put out the evening dance's bonfire, you had fenced burdenbeasts, and decorations hung outside on the walls...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Your lives might've been tough, but you still enjoyed how you lived.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You wouldn't have killed me. After that, not even the dance would feel right anymore.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Who kills someone and stays calm as a lake? Only vicious monsters would. And they're not common at all.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Don't you think you're too optimistic about people?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: I've seen too many bad things. In so many cases, they were done by those without another choice.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If they had the choice to make, I know that the vast majority of people, across the whole wide world, would choose to be good people.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...And nothing like what Kashchey said.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: He said that all people were disgraceful, that you'd hate them and their evil in the end, all because you were so kind-hearted.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: ...What a horrible curse to want to make. It's about as poisonous as words can get.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: And that's why I'm sure I'll never hate anyone. Everything they do has a reason behind it.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Do you want me to watch over you?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Maybe that wouldn't be so bad.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But what about after I'm gone? You'd have to figure things out on your own then.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: It's bad luck to be so ominous, you know.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We'll always have to confront it. Us little Infected sooner or later have to make our exits.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Taking the little time we have left, and doing something that makes the fact we live worthwhile... there's nothing bad about that.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: *chuckle*. I think the same way.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It might not be easy, Alina, it might not be easy, but I still believe the Infected should reunite as one.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We should find where we belong again in Ursus. If possible, this world should in turn examine its own deeds.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: After that, it's not just the Infected... not just the Infected.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Whether Ursus, Victoria, Leithanien, regardless of country, regardless of race, regardless of your background... we'll sear away all these things that divide us.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: We should all have lives where we deserve to be equally loved. If someone stands in the way of that life, then we'll take back what's rightfully ours.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: If you want to do it, you could give it a trial run first.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: We'd probably be wiped out to the last.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Wasn't your first step to challenge Ursus, anyway?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: No matter what we do, it's all a challenge to Ursus.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: But when we give some, we gain some. Despite the fact the return isn't certain to be for us.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I can't call to mind things as wicked as you could... but my impression is that things in this world might not be as good as you often suppose.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: You mean?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Talulah, do you only give so that you can gain?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: ...Alina, no. That's not right. What you're asking for is... too...
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I know. But you need to think that way.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: I won't. I—I definitely won't.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I believe all we've done will bear good fruit, and the reason is simple to match. Because they deserve that result. Because the creatures of this world deserve that fruit.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...Mm. Okay. Let's go.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: Are you going to join with the guerrillas?
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: I need them to approve of me first.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: It'll be difficult.
attributes.name: Alina

attributes.content: It'll take more than difficulty to slow me down.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: FrostNova! Here's the... person who helped us back there!
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: Keep your bolts nocked.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: *Phew*... *huff*.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You're just like the rumors say. So cold, you Yetis. Cold enough to outstrip this awful winter weather.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Are you their commander?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Infected?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: You need to explain, then. Why are you wearing an Ursus military officer's uniform?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: I've come up with a lot of lies for that. Any preference?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Fire.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Wait!  You just don't do humor, do you? Are you the Yeti Squad's leader?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Why haven't you fired?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: She really... did just... help us now, Sister. Promise.
attributes.name: Yeti Squad Member

attributes.content: It's true, Yetis. I came here to seek assistance, as well as to assist you.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: ...Assist us?
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Let's shake on it, Captain Yeti! When conveying sincerity, I always hope to go the equal and dignified route.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: I hope we can both have ourselves a dignified, tranquil, level dialogue.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: ...Try it. I think I've pegged who you are.
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Those Originium crystals they're carrying have your Arts, don't they?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: Heh.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: If I'm able to melt your ice, would you be willing to hear me out for a bit?
attributes.name: Talulah

attributes.content: —Dream on. You couldn't.
attributes.name: FrostNova

attributes.content: Let's try it.
attributes.name: Talulah
